amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-386 to state that the changes of law made by this legislation will not take effect until after the Secretary of Health and Human Services certifies to the Congress, after consultation with the Secretary of Homeland Security, that the implementation of the legislation will pose no additional risk to the public health or safety from terrorist attacks relating to the food supply.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
